channel.title: La Grande|Union County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in La Grande|Union County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-30 East - La Grande
item.description: Entering La Grande on US-30 east. La Grande is the county seat of Union County and home to Eastern Oregon University.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 259
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 259 - US-30/La Grande/National Historic District. Overhead for I-84 to Baker City and Ontario. US-30 leaves I-84 eastbound here, and rejoins with I-84 on the other side of LaGrande. LaGrande is the county seat of Union County.

item.title: OR-82 East at I-84 West (Exit 261)
item.description: OR-82 East at I-84 West (Exit 261) to Pendleton. Continue east on OR-82 for Elgin and Wallowa Lake.

item.title: End OR-203 North at I-84/US-30
item.description: End OR-203 north at I-84/US-30. Turn left for I-84 west; continue under freeway for I-84 east.

item.title: End OR-203 at I-84/US-30
item.description: End OR-203 at I-84/US-30 junction. Turn left for I-84 west to Pendleton; continue straight for I-84 east, and US-30 west to La Grande.

item.title: OR-82 West Approaching US-30
item.description: OR-82 West approaching US-30 and (La Grande) City Center. The overhead sign is attached to the Union Pacific Railroad overpass.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 261
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 261 - OR-82/La Grande/Elgin.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 259
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 259 - US-30/La Grande. Overhead for I-84 to Baker City and Ontario.

item.title: I-84 East - La Grande Route Diagram
item.description: Route diagram of La Grande routes on I-84 east approaching Exit 261.

item.title: OR-82 West approaching I-84
item.description: OR-82 west approaching I-84 to Baker City and Pendleton.

item.title: OR-82 West at I-84 East
item.description: OR-82 west to La Grande at I-84 east to Baker City.

item.title: OR-82 West at I-84 West
item.description: OR-82 west I-84 west to Pendleton.

item.title: I-84 East - La Grande Route Diagram
item.description: I-84 east approaching La Grande. Map of routes in the La Grande area.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 261
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 261, OR-82/La Grande City Center/Elgin.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 278
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 278, Clover Creek.
